title: Look and lease today of our available 1 bed 1.5 bath!
map_address: 15808 Bear Creek Parkway near Redmond Way
posting_body: ['SURROUND YOURSELF WITH BRILLIANCE', 'Don’t just live, radiate.', 'As natural light illuminates spacious studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans, Radiate Apartment’s thoughtful design and uniquely innovative amenities unite to create a modern living experience and a warm and inviting home.', 'We offer a place for you to foster all your creative and intellectual energies in from outdoor social spaces and co-working spaces to electric car charging stations and gear storage, we have everything you could want and more.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 815 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Deep soaker style bathtubs', '- USB charging outlets in living areas', '- Polished quartz countertops', '- Mosaic tile kitchen backsplash', '- Elevator access', '- Refrigerator with ice-maker', '- Built-in bookshelves and desks', '- Whirlpool EnergyStar appliances', '- Wood-style plank flooring', '- Kitchen island with pendant lighting', '- In-home washer and dryer', '- Stove', '- Oversized double pane tinted windows', '- Dishwasher', '- Built-in microwave', 'Community Amenities', '- Subterranean garage with controlled-entry access with dedicated parking', '- State-of-the-art fitness center', '- Onsite retail with unique eateries and shopping right at your doorstep', '- Dog wash and self-service grooming area', '- Game room', '- Steps from local parks and trails, including Redmond Central Connecter Park and Sammamish River Trail', '- Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '- Billiards table', '- Terrace', '- Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi', '- Easy access to SR 520', '- Walk Score of 91', '- Virtual moving concierge', '- Controlled-access bike storage and bike repair room', '- Outdoor fireplace', '- Outdoor television', '- Demonstration kitchen', '- Smoke-free community', '- Barbecue pavilion', '- EV charging stations', '- Bike Score of 90', '- Built to Living Green program standards', '- Resident social lounge', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Income Requirements:', '2.75x amount of rent', 'Office Hours', 'MONDAY - TUESDAY: 10am - 6pm', 'WEDNESDAY: 11am - 6pm', 'THURSDAY-FRIDAY: 10am - 6pm', 'SATURDAY: 10am - 5pm', 'SUNDAY: CLOSED', 'Radiate Apartments', '15808 Bear Creek Parkway, Redmond, WA, 98052', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.', 'Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.', 'Photos on this
